content.rendered:
“D” Day                                                                                                                                        

                                                                                                  

ANNOUNCEMENTS

Friday, September 19, 2025

 

The HS Counseling Department will be hosting a college fair at Saratoga Springs High School on Thursday, September 25 from 6:30-8:00 PM in the Blue gymnasium. This is a wonderful opportunity for high school students to explore a variety of college options. We hope you will take advantage of these opportunities to explore a few two-year and four-year schools.

 

All students must have their student ID’s when purchasing school lunch.

 

Late Buses will not start until Sept. 22.

 

Seniors: It’s the time of the year! College Visits have begun: There are many schools holding visits from now until mid-December. To register, log into your Naviance account. See the counseling office or the bulletin board outside the counseling office for more information. College Instant Admissions Day will begin on November 19th. We have 3 local colleges holding events this year. Students will meet with a college admissions counselor to review their application and transcript. Students who are interested in participating should register at their senior conference or stop by the counseling office.

 

The Shades of Blue creative writing club will meet on Monday September 22nd for the second meeting. Will we be writing, so bring your writing notebook. 

 

Hola!  There will be a Spanish Club meeting in G210 after school on Tuesday, September 23rd. All are welcome!

 

There will be a peer tutoring meeting on Tuesday 9/23 and Thursday 9/25 in G222 for anyone interested in becoming a peer tutor this year. You only need to attend one meeting. If you cannot attend either meeting, please email Ms. Narkiewicz

The Drama Club will be meeting this afternoon in the Auditorium.
